markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Tollvych](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1713)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 44

**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 44

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Tollvych](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1713)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghost" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=217" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=222" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=149" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 27</row>

**Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19)

**Skills**
[Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +27, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +29, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +27, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +29

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +6

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +6
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +25 

**Will** +28 

</row>

**HP** 200
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation)

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
all damage 15 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), or [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
ghostly hand +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 3d12+10 negative

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 36, attack +28
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229)
- **1st**
[Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (×3)
- **2nd**
[Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) (×2)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Nondetection](/Spells.aspx?ID=209)
- **4th**
[Nightmare](/Spells.aspx?ID=208), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)
- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Hallucination](/Spells.aspx?ID=144)
- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76)
- **7th**
[Duplicate Foe](/Spells.aspx?ID=93)
- **8th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219)

**Bone-Shattering Cry** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) Tollvych cries out in pain as his body twists and grinds into horrific, distorted shapes. All creatures within a 30-foot emanation take 16d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 36 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save) as the sound of the Bone-Shattering Cry shakes and shatters their own bones. Tollvych can't use Bone-Shattering Cry for 1d4 rounds.

**Frightful Moan** <actions string="Two Actions" />  (auditory, divine, emotion, enchantment, fear, mental); Tollvych laments his fate, forcing each living creature within 30 feet to attempt a DC 36 Will save. On a failure, a creature becomes [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (or frightened 3 on a critical failure). On a success, a creature is temporarily immune to Tollvych's frightful moan for 1 minute.

</column>
name: Tollvych
resistance_markdown: all damage 15 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), or [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))
resistance_raw: all damage 15 (except  force ,   ghost touch  , or  positive ; double resistance vs. non- magical )
